questions.text: Going by official American Checkers Federation rules, what color makes the first move in the game of checkers, red or black?
questions.explanation:
Black.

	According to the Federation rules, the darker color goes first.

questions.text: What quiz show had a wooden duck drop down with a secret word?
How many numbered squares are there on a US Bingo card?
questions.explanation:
24.

	The center square free space does not have a number.

questions.text: Dr. Joyce Brothers' subject on the $64,000 Question was what?
Which is not a kind of poker?
How many people are surveyed for a Family Feud question?
How many tiles are there in a traditional Mah-Jongg game?
What is the suit in which the highest possible flush occurs?
questions.explanation:
Spades.

	Note spades is considered the highest suit in cards but in poker two flushes in different suits will split the pot.

questions.text: How many squares are there in one row on a chessboard?
What is the name of the toy company that originally made Toss-Across?
